noun.description: The method of presenting a play or other dramatic performance.
examples: the quality of staging and design
one of the better stagings of Hamlet

noun.description: The activity or practice of styling and furnishing a property for sale in such a way as to enhance its attractiveness to potential buyers.
examples: home staging has become a huge trend in the real estate industry
learn how staging can help you sell faster and at a higher price point

noun.description: A stage or set of stages or temporary platforms arranged as a support for performers or between different levels of scaffolding.
Diagnosis or classification of the particular stage reached by a progressive disease.
The arrangement of stages in a rocket or spacecraft.
